review: i have no word to explain how much i love this film, this is one of the best romantic - comedy of bollywood, i cant stop laughing while watching its funny scenes. dialogue delievery, acting everything is sooo good. 😍😍😍😍😘😘😘😘😘😘 its emotional scenes are very heart touching too, in short the film is complete package of entertainment. 👌👍

let entertainment be entertainment, and even though i keep in mind that a film of that sort is meant is a commercial venture, that is meant to appease the public to raise cash, i must retort to saying that this movie is full of pathetic scenes, which makes even me laugh, for they are ludicrous. the extent to which a director has gone, in drifting away from reality, to usher in the ludicrous, is, in itself, ludicrous. it is good time killer, if that is all it is. but, if the need be to see a good movie, this is surely not it.

this is one of my favorites i really love it and ranbeer's performance was fab if i watch this movie 1000 times but never get bored of watching it this movie has action, romance, comedy, emotions its like full package of entertainment by this we learn that we should help others

a perfect blend of romance, comedy and emotions. all the stress gets released and you laugh, smile and thoroughly enjoy. superb music is an icing on the cake.
